CustomField.description: The product family of the Applicable Product. The picklist values should align with the 'Product Family' field on the Product object. When a Maintenance Plan is created using the Maintenance Plan Template, this product family retrieves the Assets linked to the source record to create Maintenance Assets on the Plan.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The product family of the Applicable Product. The picklist values should align with the 'Product Family' field on the Product object. When a Maintenance Plan is created using the Maintenance Plan Template, this product family retrieves the Assets linked to the source record to create Maintenance Assets on the Plan.
CustomField.label: Product Family
